## Data Plot 
<h3> Trees' Volume Vs Trees' Height </h3> 


```{r comment = " ", eval=TRUE, fig.align='center', fig.cap="Volume Vs Height"}

    plot( 
          trees$Volume,
          trees$Height,
          xlab = "Trees' Volume",          
          ylab = "Trees' Height",
          col = "magenta"
        )


```
